about.summary: Application of 'FateID' allows computation and visualization of cell fate bias for multi-lineage single cell transcriptome data. Herman, J.S., Sagar, Grün D. (2018) <DOI:10.1038/nmeth.4662>.

name: r-fateid
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.9' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fateid
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/FateID_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/FateID/FateID_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5b42103d3b6c5b369b4644d3bdad29944dfd65689d6c41d40396c4cb432a0258

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip              # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-rtsne
    - r-lle
    - r-locfit
    - r-pheatmap
    - r-princurve
    - r-randomforest
    - r-som
    - r-umap
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-rtsne
    - r-lle
    - r-locfit
    - r-pheatmap
    - r-princurve
    - r-randomforest
    - r-som
    - r-umap

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('FateID')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('FateID')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=FateID
  license: GPL-3
  summary: "Application of 'FateID' allows computation and visualization of cell fate bias for
    multi-lineage single cell transcriptome data. Herman, J.S., Sagar, Gr\xFCn D. (2018)
    <DOI:10.1038/nmeth.4662>."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: FateID
# Title: Quantification of Fate Bias in Multipotent Progenitors
# Version: 0.1.9
# Date: 2019-09-21
# Author: Dominic Grun <dominic.gruen@gmail.com>
# Maintainer: Dominic Grun <dominic.gruen@gmail.com>
# Description: Application of 'FateID' allows computation and visualization of cell fate bias for multi-lineage single cell transcriptome data. Herman, J.S., Sagar, Grun D. (2018) <DOI:10.1038/nmeth.4662>.
# Depends: R (>= 3.4)
# Imports: graphics, grDevices, lle, locfit, pheatmap, princurve, randomForest, RColorBrewer, Rtsne, som, stats, umap, utils
# Suggests: DESeq2, destiny, knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# License: GPL-3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-09-21 19:06:06 UTC; d.grun
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-09-21 20:20:06 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
